Risk Description: No liability caps specified for reimbursement claims
Mitigation: Include clear liability caps in the policy to limit financial exposure for the company.

Risk Description: Indeterminate terms regarding reimbursement for expenses not explicitly listed
Mitigation: Define and list all reimbursable expenses explicitly to avoid ambiguity.

Risk Description: Missing SLAs for reimbursement processing times
Mitigation: Set specific service level agreements (SLAs) for processing reimbursement claims to ensure timely payments.

Risk Description: No mention of auto-renewals or notice requirements for policy terms
Mitigation: Include a clause specifying any auto-renewal terms and provide advance notice before renewals.

Risk Description: Unbalanced indemnification terms not addressing employee liability
Mitigation: Include balanced indemnification clauses that outline both company and employee liabilities.
